title: Is Burger King About to Reveal the PS5 UI? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.13.20
description:
IGN's Janet Garcia joins Tim to talk about Burger King's PS5 tease, Borderlands 3 coming to next-gen, and more! 

Follow Janet: https://twitter.com/Gameonysus

00:00:00 - Start
00:03:35 - Housekeeping
We got lots of STREAMS
Second Extinction with Greg and Andy Wednesday at 11 a.m. PT
Greg Joey and Kevin play Untitled Goose Game CoOp Thursday at 11 am
Ghost of Tsushima Legends with Greg and Blessing Friday at 11:30 a.m. PT
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Black Jack, & Tom Bock
The Roper Report   -
00:07:15 - Burger King’s Revealing the PS5 UI? Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:14:55 - Spider-Man: Mile Morales is Game Informer’s Cover Story, Andrew Reiner @ GI
00:20:45 - FINE, I’LL DO IT MYSELF: Bloodborne Modder Promises to Upgrade Bloodborne if Sony Won’t, Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:28:50 - Borderlands Next-Gen Launch Date, Deets, Borderlands.com
00:34:45 - For real, Halo 5 isn’t coming to the MCC, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:39:30 - Microsoft giving away Cloud Saves for Xbox 360 Users in effort to get’em to upgrade, Mike Fahey @ Kotaku
00:43:50 -  DoorDash 
00:44:10 -  BESPOKE 
00:46:09 -  UPSTART 
00:47:30 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:51:30 - I was wondering if we should be cautious with this type of gam - Justin B.
00:54:30 - Squad Up:Jordan Maddox(PS4) - Mystic_Maddox on PS4 maddoxbros19 on pc
00:55:14 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Danny Pena
